title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: It isn't all a bed of roses for the US acting in the Ukraine. Do we have any corroboration of the below?REPORTS: U.S. Admiral Surrenders to Russia in Mariupol, UkraineQuote from: https://halturnerradioshow.com/index.php/en/news-page/world/reports-u-s-admiral-surrenders-to-russia-in-mariupol-ukraine...Along with U.S. Admiral Olson (Ret'd), British Lieutenant Colonel John Bailey and 4 NATO military instructors also allegedly surrendered to Russia.There is also news of Canadian, French, and Turkish military officers still hiding inside tunnels beneath the Azovstal Steel Mill in Mariupol.What these men were allegedly doing there and who sent them there, is not yet known.If confirmed by the Pentagon, the massive question this raises is why are U.S. military officers, and the military officers from other NATO countries, inside Ukraine at all, and who authorized them to participate in waging undeclared war upon Russia?(Hal Turner Remark: I have reached out to the Pentagon Public Affairs Duty Officer via the off-hours/Weekend media contact telephone number, seeking Pentagon comment.   The Duty Officer I spoke with requested I send them details via email, which has been done.If a reply comment is received from the Pentagon Press Office, it will be added to this story.)...

comments.author: BADecker
comments.created_time: May 18, 2022, 02:43:59 PMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 12:16:32 AM by BADecker
comments.body: Watch the short video at the site. Ukraine vows to take Mariupol back (chuckle). Now might be a good time for all you guys who are looking, to get an Ukrainian wife.Ukraine declares end to battle for Mariupol, ceding control of key port city to RussiaQuote from: https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/ukraine-end-battle-mariupol-evacuate-azovstal-soldiers-russia-rcna24451Ukraine ordered soldiers defending the last pocket of Mariupol to stop fighting, effectively ceding control of the southeastern port city to Russia after a bloody monthslong struggle that came to signify the brutality of the Kremlin's war and fortitude of Kyiv's resistance.Ukraine said its focus was now on evacuating the troops from the Azovstal steel plant, where they have been holed up under fire. The decision represents an important but costly victory for Moscow as its military offensive struggles and its geopolitical position is weakened further by Sweden and Finland's bids to join NATO....

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: This war is almost over. There almost aren't enough soldiers in all of Ukraine to cover those in this story.Ongoing Surrender "On Far Bigger Scale Than Kyiv Has Acknowledged" At AzovstalQuote from: https://www.zerohedge.com/military/ongoing-surrender-far-bigger-scale-kyiv-has-acknowledged-azovstalRussia's defense ministry has now revised the numbers of Ukrainian fighters to have emerged from the besieged Azovstal steel plant in Mariupol upward to more than 1,700 soldiers that have left the plant. A new Reuters headline has stressed that there's ongoing "silence from Kyiv" as the surrender is on a much larger than expected scale:Moscow said on Thursday that 1,730 Ukrainian fighters had surrendered in Mariupol over three days, including 771 in the past 24 hours, claiming a surrender on a far bigger scale than Kyiv has acknowledged since ordering its garrison to stand down....

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Looks like Russia is cleaning out the Nazis of the Ukraine, bit by bit.I think we're going to see an overall Russian success regarding Ukraine. When Biden is out of office, this success will happen faster.Surrender of Nazified Ukrainian Azov Thugs in Mariupol ConcludedQuote from: https://stephenlendman.org/2022/05/21/mass-surrender-of-ukrainian-nazi-azov-thugs-in-mariupol-concluded/#more-38126Surrender of Nazified Ukrainian Azov Thugs in Mariupol Concludedby Stephen LendmanOn Friday, Russia's Defense Minister confirmed the surrender of remaining Nazified Azov and likeminded thugs from the bowels of Mariupol's Azovstal steel plant.In total, nearly 2,500 worst of the worst are in Russia's custody as POWs.A Friday statement by Russia's Defense Ministry said the following:"The last group of 531 militants (inside Azovstal) surrendered today."A total of "2,439 Azov Nazis" and likeminded Ukrainian military personnel laid down their arms and surrendered since May 16.The city of Mariupol and Azovstal plant are cleansed from their scourge.Russian and Donetsk militia forces have complete control of the city, its residents entirely liberated at last from the scourge of Nazified terror....
